title: Renowned crocodile expert Adam Britton jailed for sexually abusing dogs
US election: Trump’s 2020 praise for Walz's response to Minneapolis riots collides with current criticism
Russia accuses UK of instigating and taking part in Ukraine's 'major provocation'
content: Russia accused the UK of involvement in Ukraine's attack on Russia's Kursk region. Kyiv's troops, equipped with Western tanks, attacked Russia's Kursk to divert Russian forces. Russia claimed it halted the advance, causing heavy casualties. Recent offensive into Russian territory seems to be carried out by a substantial force of several thousand Ukrainian soldiers. The US approved the operation, citing defensive capabilities against imminent Russian attacks.
summary: Russia accused the UK of involvement in Ukraine's attack on Russia's Kursk region. Kyiv's troops, equipped with Western tanks, attacked Russia's Kursk to divert Russian forces. Russia claimed it halted the advance, causing heavy casualties. Recent offensive into Russian territory seems to be carried out by a substantial force of several thousand Ukrainian soldiers. The US approved the operation, citing defensive capabilities against imminent Russian attacks.

title: Tropical storm Debby’s fury: Tornadoes and floods impact homes, schools, and lives
content: Tornadoes generated by Tropical Storm Debby caused destruction in North and South Carolina, damaging homes and infrastructure, including Springfield Middle School. One fatality was reported in Lucama, North Carolina. The storm led to significant flooding in both Carolinas and southeastern Georgia. With Debby downgraded to a tropical depression, further rains and flooding were anticipated in the region.
summary: Tornadoes generated by Tropical Storm Debby caused destruction in North and South Carolina, damaging homes and infrastructure, including Springfield Middle School. One fatality was reported in Lucama, North Carolina. The storm led to significant flooding in both Carolinas and southeastern Georgia. With Debby downgraded to a tropical depression, further rains and flooding were anticipated in the region.

title: Hall of Fame golfer Juan 'Chi Chi' Rodriguez passes away at 88
Ukraine launches unexpected attack inside Russia, shakes up 30-month war in bold move
content: Ukrainian forces launched an unexpected attack into Russian territory, surprising Moscow and opening a new front in the conflict. The incursion, involving about 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers, aimed to divert Russian resources and alleviate pressure on Ukrainian forces in the east. Russian officials reported several settlements were seized, prompting a state of emergency in one region.
summary: Ukrainian forces launched an unexpected attack into Russian territory, surprising Moscow and opening a new front in the conflict. The incursion, involving about 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers, aimed to divert Russian resources and alleviate pressure on Ukrainian forces in the east. Russian officials reported several settlements were seized, prompting a state of emergency in one region.

title: Teen loses life after dairy allergy reaction to Costa Coffee hot chocolate
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro signs decree blocking X access for 10 days
content: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has blocked access to social media platform X for 10 days following a disputed election. Maduro, accusing Elon Musk of inciting unrest, signed a resolution presented by Conatel. Opposition leaders claim the election was fraudulent, leading to protests and calls from international bodies for transparency, while security forces cracked down on demonstrators.
summary: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has blocked access to social media platform X for 10 days following a disputed election. Maduro, accusing Elon Musk of inciting unrest, signed a resolution presented by Conatel. Opposition leaders claim the election was fraudulent, leading to protests and calls from international bodies for transparency, while security forces cracked down on demonstrators.

title: Harris doesn't back Israel arms embargo, aide says
content: Kamala Harris's aide clarified that she does not support an arms embargo on Israel, emphasizing her commitment to ensuring Israel's defense. This stance comes amid pressure from the Democratic left and in the context of her recent interactions with pro-Palestinian protesters. Harris’s position is critical in the battleground state of Michigan, where many oppose the Gaza war.
summary: Kamala Harris's aide clarified that she does not support an arms embargo on Israel, emphasizing her commitment to ensuring Israel's defense. This stance comes amid pressure from the Democratic left and in the context of her recent interactions with pro-Palestinian protesters. Harris’s position is critical in the battleground state of Michigan, where many oppose the Gaza war.

title: Is Trump the reason behind Prince Harry and Meghan's urgency to repair royal ties?
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have been making attempts to reconcile with King Charles due to an anticipated US election. Harry recently visited his father, who is undergoing cancer treatment. Past comments by Trump's son and Harry's visa concerns have added to the desperate. Meghan also has a strained relationship with Trump.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have been making attempts to reconcile with King Charles due to an anticipated US election. Harry recently visited his father, who is undergoing cancer treatment. Past comments by Trump's son and Harry's visa concerns have added to the desperate. Meghan also has a strained relationship with Trump.

title: Kamala Harris ahead by 5 points, Donald Trump trails in key swing states, new poll shows
content: Democrat Kamala Harris led Republican Donald Trump 42% to 37% in the latest Ipsos poll for the November 5 US presidential election. This marked an increase from a previous survey in July. An independent candidate, Robert Kennedy Jr, saw his support drop from 10% to 4%. Harris also led Trump in seven key states, and voters associated “patriot” more with Trump but “weird” more with Trump too.
summary: Democrat Kamala Harris led Republican Donald Trump 42% to 37% in the latest Ipsos poll for the November 5 US presidential election. This marked an increase from a previous survey in July. An independent candidate, Robert Kennedy Jr, saw his support drop from 10% to 4%. Harris also led Trump in seven key states, and voters associated “patriot” more with Trump but “weird” more with Trump too.

title: ‘Not my child’: Woman’s surrogacy nightmare revealed after DNA test
content: A Reddit post revealed a woman’s DNA test showing she is not the biological mother of her 2-year-old son, leading to her discovering her husband's infidelity with the surrogate. Devastated, she decided to divorce her husband and give up parental rights, sparking controversy and discussion around possible legal actions against the surrogate.
summary: A Reddit post revealed a woman’s DNA test showing she is not the biological mother of her 2-year-old son, leading to her discovering her husband's infidelity with the surrogate. Devastated, she decided to divorce her husband and give up parental rights, sparking controversy and discussion around possible legal actions against the surrogate.

title: 'Feel like a brave soldier': Trump calls avoiding STDs his 'personal Vietnam' in old video
content: In a 1997 interview, Donald Trump likened his dating life to a soldier’s experience in the Vietnam War, calling it his 'personal Vietnam' due to the risks of contracting STDs. He claimed his dating exploits deserved the Congressional Medal of Honor. This comparison drew backlash for trivializing the experiences of Vietnam War veterans.
summary: In a 1997 interview, Donald Trump likened his dating life to a soldier’s experience in the Vietnam War, calling it his 'personal Vietnam' due to the risks of contracting STDs. He claimed his dating exploits deserved the Congressional Medal of Honor. This comparison drew backlash for trivializing the experiences of Vietnam War veterans.

title: Trump accuses Kamala Harris of being 'disrespectful' to her ethnicity
content: Former President Donald Trump deflected a question on Kamala Harris's racial identity, calling her behavior disrespectful to both Black and Indian communities. Trump emphasized it was Harris's assertion and not his. He also referenced his historical support for Harris. Trump confirmed accepting debate invitations from NBC, Fox, and ABC but hinted he might not debate Harris on ABC.
summary: Former President Donald Trump deflected a question on Kamala Harris's racial identity, calling her behavior disrespectful to both Black and Indian communities. Trump emphasized it was Harris's assertion and not his. He also referenced his historical support for Harris. Trump confirmed accepting debate invitations from NBC, Fox, and ABC but hinted he might not debate Harris on ABC.

title: In UK, 7 convicted of violence in last year’s Derby kabaddi tourney disorder
content: Two men were convicted of violent disorder and one of possessing a gun during a kabaddi tournament in Derby last summer. Police intervened after reports of shots fired and machete fights. Five others had already pleaded guilty to various offenses. All will be sentenced later. The event had hundreds attending, with many injured.
summary: Two men were convicted of violent disorder and one of possessing a gun during a kabaddi tournament in Derby last summer. Police intervened after reports of shots fired and machete fights. Five others had already pleaded guilty to various offenses. All will be sentenced later. The event had hundreds attending, with many injured.

title: ‘I’m not a fan, but ...’: Did Trump show unexpected sympathy for Biden? Watch video
China looks to its shipyards to beat US in any future war
content: In China's Changxing Island Shipbuilding Base, the construction of the world's largest amphibious assault ship, the 076 Class, suggests a significant military buildup. Expected to launch by 2025, this rapid shipbuilding outpaces US and European refits, raising concerns about Beijing's potential preparations for a major conflict, possibly involving Taiwan.
summary: In China's Changxing Island Shipbuilding Base, the construction of the world's largest amphibious assault ship, the 076 Class, suggests a significant military buildup. Expected to launch by 2025, this rapid shipbuilding outpaces US and European refits, raising concerns about Beijing's potential preparations for a major conflict, possibly involving Taiwan.

title: 'He’s got glasses, long hair': New footage shows the moment police spotted Trump shooter; watch
UK aid agency office in Bangladesh ransacked
content: The Khulna office of Caritas Bangladesh was attacked and ransacked by a mob amid a law and order breakdown following former PM Sheikh Hasina's resignation. The attackers looted the office and occupied the land, with staff narrowly escaping harm. No police intervention was reported, and the staff have not yet returned as the trespassers remain on the premises.
summary: The Khulna office of Caritas Bangladesh was attacked and ransacked by a mob amid a law and order breakdown following former PM Sheikh Hasina's resignation. The attackers looted the office and occupied the land, with staff narrowly escaping harm. No police intervention was reported, and the staff have not yet returned as the trespassers remain on the premises.

title: ‘Speaking now’: Harris shuts down disrupters
